subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Roger Clemens and Barry Bonds never play baseball again, they could be on the Hall of Fame ballot in 2013 and would learn together how much their off-the-field issues affected their legacies.
snippet: If Roger Clemens and Barry Bonds never play baseball again, they could be on the Hall of Fame ballot in 2013 and would learn together how much their off-the-field issues affected their legacies.
